title: How to Beat Salazar in Resident Evil 4

steps.headline: Before starting the battle, equip and reload the TMP.
steps.description: Ensure you place the rocket launcher in your attache case.

steps.headline: When the battle begins, use the TMP and fire repeatedly at the eye.
steps.description: Keep doing this until the cut scene that shows the "cocoon" opening to reveal Salazar.

steps.headline: Aim for Salazar's unarmed and unprotected body and FIRE!
steps.description: If successful, Salazar will scream in horror before dying and the area is cleared. If not successful, repeat this process as many times as needed.

text: Before starting the battle, equip and reload the TMP. Ensure you place the rocket launcher in your attache case. When the battle begins, use the TMP and fire repeatedly at the eye. Keep doing this until the cut scene that shows the "cocoon" opening to reveal Salazar. Immediately equip the rocket launcher.  Aim for Salazar's unarmed and unprotected body and FIRE! If successful, Salazar will scream in horror before dying and the area is cleared. If not successful, repeat this process as many times as needed.
